casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. Antonio Gomez MAQUEO, Relator-Appellant, v. William C. HECHT, as U. S. Marshal, etc., et al., Respondents-Appellees. UNITED STATES ex rel. Salvador ATECA, Relator-Appellant, v. SAME. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 22, 1929. Nos. 373, 374. D. P. Siegel, of New York City (Dudley Field Malone, Leo H. Klugherz, and Sidney Handler, all of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Orders affirmed in open court.
